universals
Class LogManager

java.lang.Object
  universals.LogManager

public class LogManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages output to a log. This is a "static method" class so LogManager does not need to be instantiated to log things

Since:
2-25-2011

Method Detail

logError

public static void logError(java.lang.Exception e)
simply logs an error and the time it occured.

Parameters:
e - the error to log (from the catch)

logError

public static void logError(java.lang.Exception e,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            int lineNumber,
                            java.lang.String classOfException,
                            boolean print)
This method logs an error, the time it occured, the description, and the place where the error happened

Parameters:
e - the error to log (from the catch)
description - the description of the error that occured (can be user defined)
lineNumber - the line number of which the error occured
classOfException - the class which called the logError
print - whether or not to printStackTrace()

logError

public static void logError(java.lang.Exception e,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            int lineNumber,
                            java.lang.String classOfException)
similar to logError(Exception e, String description, int lineNumber, String classOfException, boolean print), except this does not print anything (only logs it)

Parameters:
e - the error to log (from the catch)
description - the description of the error that occured (can be user defined)
lineNumber - the line number of which the error occured
classOfException - the class which called the logError

logError

public static void logError(java.lang.Exception e,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            int lineNumber,
                            java.lang.Object classOfException)
similar to logError(Exception e, String description, int lineNumber , String classOfException), except that an object is used and is logged

Parameters:
e - the error to log (from the catch)
description - the description of the error that occured (can be user defined)
lineNumber - the line number of which the error occured
classOfException - the class which called the logError, in Object form

logError

public static void logError(java.lang.Exception e,
                            boolean print)
simply logs an error and has a choice to print

Parameters:
e - the error to log (from the catch)
print - whether or not to printStackTrace()

logThing

public static void logThing(java.lang.String thing)
logs something into the default log path

Parameters:
thing - String to be logged

logThing

public static void logThing(java.lang.String thing,
                            java.lang.String location,
                            java.lang.String time)
logs a string to a specific location

Parameters:
thing - the String to be logged
location - the location for the String to be logged

logError

public static void logError(java.lang.String thing,
                            java.lang.String time)
logs a String to a specific time

Parameters:
thing - the String to be logged
time - the time recorded

logThing

public static void logThing(java.lang.String thing,
                            java.lang.String location)
adds a line to the end of a log

Parameters:
thing - the String to be logged
location - the location for the String to be logged
time - the time recorded
